name: habit-tracker
description: A habit tracking webapp that blocks websites when habits aren't completed

scripts.dev:sandbox: dotenv -e .env.development -- concurrently "npm run dev -w @habit-tracker/backend" "npm run dev -w @habit-tracker/frontend" "npm run dev -w @habit-tracker/daemon"
scripts.start:prod: dotenv -e .env.production -- concurrently "npm run start -w @habit-tracker/backend" "npm run dev -w @habit-tracker/frontend" "npm run start -w @habit-tracker/daemon"
scripts.build: npm run build -w @habit-tracker/shared && npm run build -w @habit-tracker/backend && npm run build -w @habit-tracker/daemon && npm run build -w @habit-tracker/frontend
